snippet: Peyton Manning threw three touchdown passes in the second half as the Denver Broncos overcame a 24-0 halftime deficit to stun the San Diego Chargers, 35-24, on Monday night.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos defeat San Diego Chargers, 35-24; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning threw three touchdown passes in the second half as the Denver Broncos overcame a 24-0 halftime deficit to stun the San Diego Chargers, 35-24, on Monday night.

headline.seo: Broncos Beat Chargers After Trailing, 24-0, at Half
headline.main: Scoreless at Halftime, Broncos Come From Behind to Beat the Chargers
headline.print_headline: Trailing by 24-0 at Halftime, Broncos Score 35 Points and Win
